items.sentence: I\'ll be late for the meeting if I don\'t hurry.
Tom looks as if he\'s been sick for a long time.
Do you think Tom and Mary will ever get married?
Tom had a little trouble adjusting the settings.
Tom had died by the time the paramedics arrived.
Are you currently taking any kind of medication?
Mary let Tom know she didn\'t know how to drive.
I\'m not accustomed to eating this kind of food.
Tom had so many things he wanted to say to Mary.
You haven\'t said anything to Tom yet, have you?
